revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #09 Caquic (Persim) |image = [[File:Persim.png]] |caption = Cuanta más luz solar recibe, más brillante es su color. |growtime = 1m 30s |harvest = 5 bayas |replant = 40% |mutation = 2% |points = 10 |flavor =
*10 picante *10 seco *10 dulce *0 amargo *10 ácido }} '''Caquic (Persim)''' es un tipo de [[Berries|baya]] que puede ser plantada en la [[Farm|granja]]. Se puede obtener rodeando una parcela vacía con al menos 1 baya [[Pecha|Meloc (Pecha)]] y al menos 1 baya [[Oran|Aranja (Oran)]]. == Tablas de Crecimiento == === Estados de Crecimiento === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" !!! Brote !! Crecimiento !! Floración !! Madurez |- ! Tiempo pasado desde que se planta | 20 seg || 40 seg || 50 seg || 1 min 30 seg - 3 mins |- ! Animación |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PersimTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PersimTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PersimTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} ===Tiempos de Maduración con modificadores=== {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modificador !! Tiempo hasta la madurez-marchitado |- ! Ninguno | 1 min 30 seg -
3 min |- ! Psydugadera | 1 min -
2 min |}
== Flow Chart == [[File:Persim_Flow_Chart.png|200px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations ===
You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Persim berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur.
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Base Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]]
[[Pecha]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Oran.png|30px]]
[[Oran]] |}
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Optimized Planting Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]]
[[Pecha]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]]
[[Pecha]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Oran.png|30px]]
[[Oran]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Oran.png|30px]]
[[Oran]] |- style="height: 50px;" | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | ||style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | ||style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | ||style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]]
[[Pecha]] ||style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | ||style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]]
[[Pecha]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Oran.png|30px]]
[[Oran]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Oran.png|30px]]
[[Oran]] |}
=== Timing Table === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |- |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch or Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch & Sprayduck |- | [[Oran]] || - || - || - |- | [[Pecha]] || 1 min until ripe || 40 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- |}
==Uses== ===Mutations===
Persim berries can be used to mutate the following berries.
{| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |- ! Used In !! With |- | [[File:Kelpsy.png|20px]] [[Kelpsy]] || [[File:Chesto.png|20px]] [[Chesto]] |- |}
==Acquisition== ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Berries}} {{LootItem|Berry Forest|Epic}} {{LootItem|Radio Tower|Epic}} {{LootItem|Solaceon Ruins|Common}} {{LootItem|Reversal Mountain|Common}} {{LootItem|Seaside Cave|Common}} |} |}
